titlestmt.titleproper: Ford Foundation records, Regional Offices/Field Offices
A Guide to the Ford Foundation records, Regional Offices/Field Offices FA1674

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2021-11-01 04:58:12 -0400.

did.unittitle: Ford Foundation records, Regional Offices/Field Offices

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Records more than 10 years old are open for research, unless otherwise noted. Brittle or damaged items are available at the discretion of RAC.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Offices represented currently include: Hanoi, Mexico City, Paris and Tehran. Primarily consists of office files and general files. Within each collection records often include: program files, administrative files, subject files and correspondence.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: Arranged in collections by regional office/field office. Additional finding aids are created as records are processed and open for research.
